alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 27 at 11:23AM PST until December 28 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph. Localized gusts up to 60 mph expected especially near the Blue Mountains and the Palouse where the strongest winds are expected to peak Tuesday evening into early Wednesday morning. * WHERE...La Crosse, Colfax, Plummer, Rosalia, Potlatch, Uniontown, Moscow, Clarkston, Genesee, Alpowa Summit, Oakesdale, Pomeroy, Tekoa, and Pullman. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 7 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse
